trans-unit.source: Enables the sharing of contextual information, such as property validation, parent activity, and so on, across validators during the compilation process.

For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider.

For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
An <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> that locates a GUID identified service.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider and indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.

For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
An <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> that locates a GUID identified service.
`true` to validate the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates the stack object that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
Gets the service object of the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
An object that specifies the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of service object to retrieve.
A service object of type serviceType, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
Returns an array of validators that are associated with a type by looking up the validator attribute applied on the type.

If the hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes contains the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, an array of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.

If the hash table does not contain the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, a new hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is created and then an array of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class to find.
An array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> classes.
Gets a value that indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
`true` if child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated; otherwise, `false`.
